title: The Mitford Snowmen
description: It s Yuletide in Mitford, and the big news in town is the First Annual Snowman Jubilee. Father Tim and Uncle Billy have teamed up on an entry they think is a shoe-in, but they face some tough competition from Percy and J.C. With everyone so busy trying to win, will they ever remember the true meaning of the holiday?The charming, small-format, illustrated gift edition will be a special treat for every Mitford fan, both at Christmas and throughout the year.
author: Jan Karon
